message: Let's start with a fair split, then we can negotiate from there.
Meet me halfway, let's see if we can find a better deal
I'm not willing to meet you halfway just yet. I'd like to see if we can get a better deal for myself.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve a bit more for my part in the negotiation.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think I should get the majority
I'm not willing to give up the majority. I think I deserve a bigger share, especially considering the value of money is decreasing.
I'm willing to give you a bit less, but I think I need to get a bigger share to make this deal worthwhile.
I'm not budging much more, you'll have to meet me at this point
I'm not willing to give up the majority share. I think I can get a better deal if I push a bit further.
I'm getting close to my target, but I'm still willing to compromise. Let's see if we can meet in the middle.
I'm not going to give up more than this, take it or leave it
I think I've pushed as far as I can. I'll accept this offer, but I'm not thrilled about it.
